name: Robert_Redford
text:
Robert Redford
Robert Redford was an actor who starred in the film Jeremiah Johnson as a character based upon Liver-Eating Johnson.
Behind the scenes
Robert Redford (born August 18, 1936) is an American actor, director, and producer, best known for appearing in films such as Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969), Jeremiah Johnson (1972), The Sting (1973), and All the President's Men (1976).
